mosinstall.description: In any content item, simply add {fastform TYPE NAME (VALUE) (VALIDATORS)} and you have just entered a fully functional field which will allow you to collect data from users. The data is sent to you by email. There is no database integration. For more information and complete documentation, see the file fastformcreator.php (if you have access to it through FTP) which accompanies this XML.
